meanings: (장애물·구멍 등에) catch, be caught, be[get] stuck (in), (기계 등에 끼이다) be[get] jammed, (발이) trip, stumble
(그물·덫 등에) (그물 등에) be[get] caught[entangled], (덫에) be trapped[entrapped]
외과 I can't extract a splinter.
외과 Can you remove a splinter?

vlive.korean: 감기 걸려서... As I caught a cold. 듣기 View video X1 : 시간 내에 제목이 떠오르지 않았습니다😂
뭘 1시간 20분 걸려서 가 그냥... We didn't want to spend such a long time to get there. 듣기 View video TWICE : 쯔가 사줫어요...그래서 한번 해보고싶어서...ㅋㅋ
vlive.english: We didn't want to spend such a long time to get there.

vlive.korean: 죄송해요, 세팅이 오래 걸려서 이게 뭔가 이게... Sorry, the set-up is taking so long. This is just... 듣기 View video BTS : 진짜 오랜만 🤣🤣
vlive.english: Sorry, the set-up is taking so long. This is just...

vlive.korean: 렉 걸려서 같이 잘 즐기지 못 한 거 같지만 그래도 너무... It's lagging and it seems that you didn't have much fun. Still... 듣기 View video ITZY : 믿감브🤟❤♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️
vlive.english: It's lagging and it seems that you didn't have much fun. Still...

vlive.korean: 나도 한 번만 먹을래 - 형준이 감기 걸려서 이거 먹으면 안 된다 - 둘이만 먹냐? I want a bite of it. - Hyungjun, you shouldn't eat as you caught a cold. - Is it only for you two? 듣기 View video X1 : 시간 내에 제목이 떠오르지 않았습니다😂
vlive.english: I want a bite of it. - Hyungjun, you shouldn't eat as you caught a cold. - Is it only for you two?
